    • isWall

      public boolean isWall​(int x, int y)
      Check whether that position consists a wall. Wall in the matrix represent by 0 ; Path in the matrix represent by 1.
      Parameters:
      x - An integer for the x position.
      y - An integer for the y position.
      Returns:
      true if that position contains a wall and vise versa.

      y - An integer for the y position.
      Returns:
      true when the location is the exit.

    • isObject

      public boolean isObject​(int x, int y, String type)
      /** Check whether that location on the map contains that type of object.
      Parameters:
      x - An integer for the x position.
      y - An integer for the y position.
      type - A string that defines the type of object.
      Returns:
      true when it contains a trap and vise versa.

    • objectFinder

      public int objectFinder​(int x, int y, String type)
